DOC.brief_title: Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement UNload Left Ventricle Patients With ADvanced Heart Failure ( TAVR UNLOAD )

Left ventricular ( LV ) ejection fraction ( EF ) < 50 % 6 . Anatomically suitable transfemoral TAVR SAPIEN 3 THV 1 . LVEF < 20 % persistent need intravenous inotropic support 2 . Hospitalization acute decompensated HF within 2 week prior randomization 3 . Cardiac resynchronization therapy device implantation within 3 month prior randomization 4 . Coronary artery revascularization ( PCI CABG ) within 3 month prior randomization 5 . In need suitable revascularization per heart team consensus 6 . Severe aortic regurgitation 7 . Congenital unicuspid congenital bicuspid aortic valve 8 . Concomitant nonaortic valvular disease formal indication valve surgery per establish guideline ( ESC/ACC/AHA ) 9 .
